articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Moonbin, K-pop star and member of boy band Astro, dies aged 25 - The Guardian
articles.description: The pop star was found unresponsive on Wednesday evening in his Gangnam apartment
articles.content:
K-pop star Moonbin, a member of the boy band Astro, has died at the age of 25, his music label Fantagio announced on Thursday.
Local media, citing the police, reported that Moonbin had been found un… [+2130 chars]
